duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and market programmatic efforts to support the growth of Minnesota’s startup ecosystem.
Mentor entrepreneurs and lead talks to large groups to encourage startup formation.
Plan, implement, and manage large and complex programs and partnerships related to the startup ecosystem.
Lead in a dynamic and diverse work environment, including team building and effective communication.
Build and maintain relationships and collaborations with diverse constituencies, including local, state, and federal agencies, businesses, non-profits, public officials, and other broad stakeholders.
Develop and maintain relationships with stakeholders in a startup ecosystem.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Entrepreneurship or other closely related field (Master’s preferred)
